subject: Web3
title: Systemic Risk
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Systemic Risk.

hook.text: If Tether collapsed, the entire crypto market could crash within hours. That's systemic risk.

buildup.text: USDT is the most traded crypto asset in the world. Thousands of trading pairs and DeFi protocols depend on it.

discovery.text: A Tether failure would trigger mass liquidations, exchange insolvencies, and a loss of confidence across every blockchain.

twist.text: Tether is now profitable enough to be one of the most profitable financial companies in the world, reducing collapse risk.

climax.text: The crypto market depends on a company with no full audit. The systemic risk is real but slowly decreasing.

punchline.text: One company's collapse could destroy the entire crypto market. No pressure.

quiz.question: Why does Tether represent systemic risk to crypto?
options: Thousands of trading pairs and DeFi protocols depend on USDT's stability
